document_data.name: Halangorn Forest
document_data.mainbody: '''Halangorn Forest''' was a forest on the north bank of the [[Delimbiyr River]] that was burned down by the [[Magelord (prestige class)|Magelords]] of [[Athalantar]].
document_data.Geography: The forest separated the [[human]] realm of [[Elembar]], which encompassed the land just to the east of [[Ardeep]], from the [[Forlorn Hills|Horn Hills]]. At the tip of its western<ref group="note">The text of the reference actually says "eastern end", but considering the geographical features of the area, this is considered an error end was [[Morlin Castle]], and to the south, on the opposite bank of the Delimbiyr, was the Barony of [[Steeping Falls]]. East of the forest was the realm of Athalantar.
document_data.History: At some point between the {{YearlinkName|216}} and the {{YearlinkName|218}}, the Magelords, who were at that point merely mercenary [[wizard]]s,<ref>{{Cite dragon/228/The Athalantan Campaign|32}} burned down Halangorn Forest in "the Great Fires" that they deliberately set to drive out the [[elves]] of the forests and claim their territory for humanity.
